title: Use Somebody
lyrics: INTRO x 4 I've been roaming around, Always looking down at all I see Painted faces fill the places I can’t reach You know that I could use somebody You know that I could use somebody Someone like you, and all you know, And how you speak Countless lovers under cover of the street You know that I could use somebody You know that I could use somebody Someone like you Ooooahh Ooooahhh Ahhhhh Oooahh Ooooahh Ahhhh x 3 Off in the night, while you live it up, I'm off to sleep Waging wars to shape the poet and the beat I hope it's gonna make you notice I hope it's gonna make you notice Someone like me Ooooahh Ooooahhh Ahhhhh Someone like me Ooooahh Ooooahhh Ahhhhh Someone like me Somebody Ahhhhh Someone like me Ooooahh Ooooahh Ahhhhh Don’t let it out Don’t let it out x 2 Don’t let it out Don’t let it out x 2 x 2 Someone like you Somebody Ahhhhh I've been roaming around, Always looking down at all I see
